so are you in synaptic? i'll help you get .avi's working
in synaptic go to Settings -> Repositories
now remove any of the repositories that says (source), you wont be needing em
as for the binary ones, edit them and add "universe multiverse" to sections. this will add all packages available from ubuntu repositories to download
